Show / Hide Table of Contents

Namespace MagicQuizDesktop.Models

Classes

Answer

Represents the Answer class that implements the INotifyPropertyChanged interface. Properties include Id, QuestionId, AnswerText, IsCorrect, and IsActive. There are two constructors available: a default one which initializes properties with default values, and a parameterized one which allows all properties to be set. Provides a FromJson method to create a Rank object from a JSON string.

ApiResponse<T>

Defines a standardized response used in API operations. It contains information about the success of the request, HTTP status code, message and optional data of generic type.

ApiResponseWithNoData

Represents a response from a HTTP request which does not include data in its payload. This response includes status code, a message and a boolean value indicating whether the operation was successful or not. It also includes a helper method that can parse an error message from a json response.

LoginUser

The LoginUser class represents a logged-in user. This class includes properties related to the user details like UserId and the Token for authorization. There are two constructors available: a default one which initializes properties with default values, and a parameterized one which allows all properties to be set. Provides a FromJson method to create a LoginUser object from a JSON string and a ToJson method to reverse.

Message

Represents a Message object with text and color properties, and notifies when the properties change.

Question

The Question class represents a question in a system. This class includes properties related to question details like Id, QuestionText, TopicId and a list of the answers. There are two constructors available: a default one which initializes properties with default values, and a parameterized one which allows all properties to be set. Provides a FromJson method to create a Rank object from a JSON string.

Rank

The Rank class represents a rank status and information about the user in a system. This class includes properties related to the user and rank status like RankNumber, RankColor, Name, UserId, Score, Email. There are two constructors available: a default one which initializes properties with default values, and a parameterized one which allows all properties to be set. Provides a FromJson method to create a Rank object from a JSON string.

Serialize

A static Serialize class to a JSON.

Topic

The Topic class represents a Topic in a system. This class includes properties related to a topic details like Id and the name of the topic. There are two constructors available: a default one which initializes properties with default values, and a parameterized one which allows all properties to be set. Provides a FromJson method to create a Topic object from a JSON string.

User

The User class represents a user in a system. This class includes properties related to user details like Id, Name, Email, Password, Avatar, Gender, IsActive, IsAdmin and AuthToken. There are two constructors available: a default one which initializes properties with default values, and a parameterized one which allows all properties to be set. Provides a FromJson method to create a User object from a JSON string.

Interfaces

IQuestionRepository

Represents an interface containing methods for performing CRUD operations on questions in a repository.

IRankRepository

Repository interface for Rank related CRUD operations.

ITopicRepository

Repository interface for Topic related CRUD operations.

IUserRepository

Interface for UserRepository, defining methods for user management operations.
